Module melange.events
Package gbw.melange.events.observability

Class ObservableValue<T,R extends gbw.melange.common.events.observability.UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>>

java.lang.Object
gbw.melange.events.observability.ObservableValue<T,R>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of value being observed
R - The OnChange bi consumers that can be appended.
All Implemented Interfaces:
gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IObservableValue<T,R,Integer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FallibleBlockingObservable, FallibleObservableValue, PristineBlockingObservable, PristineObservableValue
public abstract class ObservableValue<T,R extends gbw.melange.common.events.observability.UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>> extends Object implements gbw.melange.common.events.observability.IObservableValue<T,R,Integer>
Abstract Factory pattern. Also happens to contain some shared functionality and extend this to the subclasses.
Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
GustavBW
